mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_REPLY ( MEMBER_SEQ, DATE, CONTENTS, ARTICLE_SEQ, REPLY_SEQ) VALUES ( (SELECT SEQ FROM TB_MEMBER WHERE NICKNAME=#{reply.NICKNAME}), #{reply.DATE}, #{reply.CONTENTS}, #{reply.ARTICLE_SEQ}, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_ARTICLE WHERE ARTICLE_SEQ = #{reply.ARTICLE_SEQ})+1 )
mapper.select: SELECT R.REPLY_SEQ, R.CONTENTS, R.DATE, M.NICKNAME FROM TB_REPLY R INNER JOIN TB_MEMBER M WHERE #{id}=ARTICLE_SEQ
